headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAXIM, PEARL T.

snippet: MAXIM--Pearl T.,died on January 24th in Manhattan. Caring and devoted daughter of Benjamin and Sara Tessler. Beloved wife of the late Leslie Maxim. Loving sister, cherished aunt and dear friend to many. A memorial service will be held on March 16, 2016 at 3:30pm at The Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue, New York, NY 10028. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in Pearl's memory to The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research. 1/3
